Articles.Content:
Sometimes life isn't that heavy after all and time altering technology can be over-rated. That's why The Dock created the Airwolf, baby sister of the Flyingfox

Airwolf completes its final trial achieving the benchmark goal of lifting 2 Jumbo-64s to lower Kerbin orbit with enough fuel for rendezvous, re-entry and landing.

Download

Airwolf v1.0

NB: Heavy cargo becomes a structural element of the craft.
